message: Start with a generous offer to see if Bob is willing to accept a small amount.
A fair and balanced split, let's make a deal!
You're getting a bit more generous, but I'm not done yet!
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal this time
You're getting close to the minimum, Bob. Don't make me go to 11!
I'm getting closer to my target, Alice. Let's make a deal!
You're getting greedy, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not going to back down, Alice. I want a better deal!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to settle for anything less than a 4:1 ratio. You can do better, Alice!
I'll meet you halfway, Bob. Let's just end this already!
